title: "Claws for Concern" Ep 396 💀 Chilling Tales for Dark Nights Podcast (Horror Fiction)
description:
This week, Chilling Tales for Dark Nights invites you to a seaside town where neon lights flicker, carnival games ring out, and the scent of salt and fryer grease hangs in the air. But behind the laughter and music, the tide is carrying in something far less welcoming. Join host Steve Taylor and a full cast of voices—Geoff Sturtevant, Otis Jiry, Christopher Drape, Nick Goroff, Kevin Barbare, Olivia Steele, Katie Otten, and more—for a tale that begins with nostalgia and ends with nightmare. When the claws start clicking, the question isn’t what’s for dinner… but who.

▬ LISTEN TO THIS EPISODE AD-FREE IN OUR PATRONS AREA ▬
🗝️ https://www.chillingtalesfordarknights.com/patrons-area/chilling-tales-for-dark-nights-the-podcast/s1e396-claws-for-concern/
